definitions.definition: To make an apology or excuse ; to acknowledge some fault or offense , with expression of regret for it, by way of amends
examples: My correspondent apologized for not answering my letter.

definitions.definition: To express regret that a certain event has occurred.
To make an apologia or defense ; to act as apologist .

main_definition: ( intransitive , often followed by “ for ” ) To make an apology or excuse ; to acknowledge some fault or offense , with expression of regret for it, by way of amends
secondary_definitions: ( intransitive ) To express regret that a certain event has occurred.
( intransitive , dated ) To make an apologia or defense ; to act as apologist .
